attributes.action: remove one old law for each new law introduced
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
whenever a new law is implemented an old existing law should be removed from the statute books.
this governments has created several thousand new laws to restict and hamper the average uk citizen. To make the law more streamlined in would be useful to remove old laws as new ones are implemented

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
